mapper.insert: INSERT INTO batch_outbox (event_type, payload, payload_size, status, created_by, created_time, first_title) VALUES (#{eventType}, #{payload}, #{payloadSize}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{firstTitle})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM batch_outbox WHERE status = 'PENDING' OR (status = 'FAILED' AND next_retry_time < NOW()) ORDER BY created_time ASC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE batch_outbox SET status = #{status}, sent_time = #{sentTime}, retry_count = #{retryCount}, next_retry_time = #{nextRetryTime} WHERE id = #{id}
